nodes.text: "Goodnight, But Not Goodbye" was a song sung in 0 ABY by Ackmena, the part-time bartender in the Mos Eisley Cantina. She sang the song to the tune (similar but slower) of "Mad About Me" in order to cheer up her customers, and get them to leave, after the Empire had placed a curfew on the entire Tatoo system.
The lyrics to her song were:
